name: Meet the Kerfluffles
description:
Note: Unfinished prototype. Hopefully will be able to update it in the next week or so. Technically playable, and the basic concept is there, you can chase some humans around. I want to build out the environment a bit more and add some variety to the humans.

Play as the adorable Kerfluffles as they seek to destroy all of humanity one neighborhood at a time! 

Click to move Kerfluffle army. Chase down humans to forcefully recruit them into your ranks.

F to toggle Fullscreen

Dev log

Made for Wizard Jam 8

Based on the Idle Thumbs podcast episode, Meet the Kerfluffles.
